description:
My place is close to CHELSEA, MEATPACKING, UNION SQUARE, WEST VILLAGE, GREENWICH VILLAGE, FLATIRON. 

You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

1 block from 1 train, 3 blocks from F,M. 5 mins away from all major subways
name: Cozy studio located in chelsea
review:
Lindsay's place is nearby Subway station, just a few minutes to Times Square. Just one week before we went to New York our host cancelled our reservation.  Lindsay was really kind and took over our reservation. We would definately recommend Lindsay. 
The appartement is cosy and in a really nice neighbourhood. If you go to New York stay with Lindsay!
